actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to prohibit the solicitation or acceptance of rebates by shippers of property in air transportation, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Prohibits the solicitation or acceptance of rebates by shippers of property in air transportation. Sets forth penalties for violations of the provisions of this Act. (Amends 49 U.S.C. 1373(b))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to prohibit the solicitation or acceptance of rebates by shippers of property in air transportation, and for other purposes.
